Name: Five Great Science Fiction Novels (Dover Thrift Editions)

ReviewList.Text: I bought this set for our grand kids and they love it. This was their first exposure to science fiction books. Initially, I told them the stories in nutshell and then they zoomed!!!!! The books fired their curiosity and imagination.
So nice to be able to find a collection of HG Wells.  This box set is just what I wish I could find for other authors as well!
This is a great deal you cant deny that. However the box the books come in looks nothing like the cool box pictured. It is kind of pink with carton science fiction art.

One of my sons was assigned H. G. Wells for an author study in one of his classes.  I told him he didn't know how lucky he was.  H. G. Wells really rocked as an author.  I orderd the boxed set and was impressed with the updated look of the covers of these stories.  The stories are still awesome even if they are a little dated.  Wells is considered one of the fathers of science fiction writing.  The stories still hold up great today.  Order this boxed set.  You won't be disappointed.  My non-reader of a son enjoyed the first story so much he read two more.  I loved that!

But the quality is a bit lacking. Then again, you get what you pay for. If you are looking for some easy subway reads, or just to fill a gap in your library this is a solid purchase, but if you want to show off beautiful editions, or even if you like to read more substantially sized books, you may want to shop around.

I read the review about the cover being pink with cartoons rather than the cover pictured.  I almost didn't order this because of that.  Maybe they changed because of the review, but the box cover is as pictured which is cool.  Bought these for my 8 year old grandson.
You cannot ask for a better price for these 5 novels.  If you buy these books, more than likely, you are a Well's fan, therefore, for this price, you cannot ask for a better deal.
This collection is great, it delivers five of the best novels by Wells at a very low price it is without a doubt a great collection.
This was a gift for my husband and he was thrilled to receive this collection.  He is almost through it and loves all the books.

H.G. Wells WAR Of THE WORLDS, THE MEN IN THE MOON, THE ISLAND OF DOCTOR MOREAU, THE INVISIBLE MAN, AND THE TIME MACHINE are clasics which have been reviewed through the years and have stood the test of time. I don't think I can add much to what's already been said. The format in which they are presented is excellent though.  It's great to get all these classics in one set.  They make a great gift for a young person or any person interested in science fiction.

HG Wells is my most beloved writer. His style is like no other. Five of his most impressive works in one set is a fantastic choice for any Science fan and lover of HG Wells. Magnificent writing that will keep you in suspense until the very end. I suggest you read The Time Machine first to break yourself in, since it is short and right to the point.
I was taking an online literature class, and almost all the books were in the public domain, but reading on screens strains my eyes, Dover was a life saver!
Amazingly affordable.  I wouldn't have found out that HG Wells was my favorite author without this collection.  Dover Thrift will continue to receive my business, and all 5 stories were awesome!
Have only read the Invisible Man but I know the other stories will be as good!  Had just seen the Invisible Man movie and was thrilled to be able to read the book.
Bought this for a Christmas gift for a youth.  I believe the construction was good for a paper back.  You get a lot for the money.
